Text:
any change to get it reseeded with minimum of 192 kbps.....

can't wait to get this album from sotre but unfortunately seems it'll take some time till it arives here so would be really really happy if you could do it :)
What's wrong with 128 kbps? It sounds good to me. Even 320 kbps sounds the same to me or do you really see some kind of difference?
The difference is that 320 takes up 10 fucking times as much space. 128's fine. Damn, you're getting something for free, you shouldn't be complaining.
Thanks for the upload, I prefer this size better since i have so much crap on my drives I dont need anything else huge.

First: 320/128 = 2.5 (not 10)
Second: He's not bitching. 128k sounds like crap to some people (like me). And just because it's free doesn't mean it can sound like crap. (Would you eat free food that _tastes_ like crap?)

What PeteSapai said, seriously. Just because your sound equipment is crap, and you can't hear the canyon of difference that 320kbit/s music makes, compared to 128kbit/s.

I'd rather take 224 or 192kbit/s than 128kbit/s as it distorts immensely when played loudly (as a ton of people, including myself, do). If you're using stock Apple earbuds or cheapo Coby headphones, then you have no right to say that 128kbit/s music sounds the same as 320kbit/s,

FLAC and every other lossless format, however, is useless, unless you're playing your music over rock concert grade speakers... (PA systems)
